message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $18,000. It's a fantastic deal for something of this quality.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay no more than $10,000 for the product. Thank you for considering my offer.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000? This product is truly top-notch and worth every penny.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, I am still looking for a price closer to what I'm willing to spend. Would you consider $12,000 as a fair offer?
